name: XTREME Pink 4chan Style
description:
Tired of that Peaces and Cheese look of 4chan.org? Change it to this AWESOME Ultra XTREME HOT PINK PUKE COLOR SCHEME.

Credit goes to Awesumness's original style, since that's where I stole it from.

Yup this is the cancer that is killing /b/... and now you can help! :)
